title: Daters Stop Swiping: The Tinder Swindler and the Very Strange Realities of Catfishing in the Modern World
itunes:title: Daters Stop Swiping: The Tinder Swindler and the Very Strange Realities of Catfishing in the Modern World
itunes:subtitle: How are people getting scammed out of their avocado money?
description:
This week The Basic & The Brain talk about the latest and greatest from Netflix that has become meme extraordinaire across social media platforms: The Tinder Swindler. Not only do we briefly recap the documentary and discuss the extreme lengths Simon Hayut/Simon Levinson went to scam these women, but we comb through data on how common catfishing has become in the modern world, what factors make folks particularly susceptible to catfishing and what causes people to catfish.


Come join us this week as we try and figure out how folks are parting with their avocado money so easily, how Tinder is combatting the catfish phenomena on their platform and what's in store for daters of the future.



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
